title: Nikolas Cruz, the Parkland Shooter, Deserved the Death Penalty
description: Retribution can help restore a moral balance.
dc:creator: Robert Blecker
media:credit: Pool photo by Mike Stocker, via Getty Images
media:description: Hui Wang, whose son, Peter, was killed by Nikolas Cruz at Marjory Stoneman Douglas High School in Parkland, Fla., after the jury rejected a death sentence for Mr. Cruz.
